about_the_game:
Set off on your new adventure in an amazing world where Magic is its own master. Assemble the pieces of this lost story together to reveal a forgotten truth.

Discover a new story

  • A beautiful story made of 20 unique puzzles hand-painted by a professional artist - no photo stock

  • Complete the story in Normal or Challenge mode as you like (shapes - grid - picture in background...)

  • All jigsaws available in 5 different sizes: 28, 112, 220, 500 or 1000 pieces

  • Unique music for each puzzle

More challenges than before

  • Discover the new Special mode featuring 15 jigsaw puzzles to complete. Magic is unpredictable, you will face the unexpected and will have to adapt to new rules!

  • 32 achievements to complete - directly available in-game!

  • One hidden puzzle to discover! Who knows where it leads...

The second episode of the series

You have been hundreds to play My Jigsaw Adventures: Roads of Life and thanks to your help and feedback. We worked very hard to make this new episode even better with more puzzles, more challenges, more variety and additional comfort features. During the development, we managed to include some features from MJA: A Lost Story to MJA: Roads of Life. We will continue to do when that's possible.

  • OS: Tested on Ubuntu 18.04 / Manjaro / Arch Linux
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1Gb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 3.0+ support

  • Sound Card: You must activate your speaker :)
